metadata.name: Alpha Wave Visions NFT Collection: Ballet Neon #1
metadata.description: A collection of Audio-reactive generative art revealing the visions of those who tried the Alpha Wave Experience. A choreography of neons in the cosmos creating geometrical shapes with their shadow. Audio-Reactive-Generative Art. Created by Alpha Wave Experience art collective. Generative Art: Dimitri Thouzery. Music: Toga Fidan / Dan Ghenacia
